attributes.action: Commerative sculpture of Team GB Olympic medal winners
attributes.additional_details: To respectfully request HM Government to set aside land & offer financial assistance in the creation in either Central London or in the Olympic Park, Stratford of a commerative relief sculpture of all the Olympic medal winners & their sports held at London 2012. To act as a permanent reminder of the ordinary citizens but extraordinary athletes who made Team GB & the people of this country proud!

rejection.details: This is a matter for the British Olympic Association.
